title: 27 Out of 32 ranked games. Negative behaviour outside of chat log
body:
27 out of 32 ranked games of atleast 2 players displaying negative behavior that DOES NOT included the abuse of the chat log. I do not understand why this is a thing, whether my team or opposing teams.

The satisfaction of winning a good game just almost doesn't exist anymore.

replies.body:
And whats sad is that that IS a good game. 
Rito have said in my recent ticket that crappy behavior is okay because its not against the rules. 
I REALLY wish I was messing with you.
? That's one to copy-paste I think.

Would if I could reaccess the ticket. 
But rito had a temper tantrum and made it hard to access.
You just have to login to your support account right? I see all my tickets that way, even the most mundane ones from forever ago.
Normally yes, but some of the tickets just do not load anymore.
It's possible you've hit a storage limit of sorts. If there's a ticket in particular you're after you may be able to request it.
Send screenshot or it didn’t happen :)

Request info on ticket ID 42702812 then. 
They'll either get upset and instantly close the ticket, or do everything to avoid actually supplying it.

I'd almost be willing to bet a skin on it.

Just go to your past tickets and show us a screenshot of riot telling you that, don’t give some lame excuse that you can’t access it. Remove vital info about you personally if you wish. 

But yeah again, screenshot or it didn’t happen.

Support isn't going to talk about another player's ticket with a third party. That's like going to your sister's friend's partner and asking them for their mother's text messages.

You can copy-paste or post a screenshot of the ticket here so long as you remove any identifying information.
I mean support just said to me post evidence on forums, but your not allowed to do that because name and shaming. so it's a loop hole for Riot not accepting their game is really bloody bad right now

They will often direct discussion-based requests to boards which may be what happened. 

Without knowing the content of your ticket I couldn't say exactly why you were directed here, but from experience it seems likely they answered what they could (they can't and won't give out any information about a player's account to a 3rd party) and the rest was topics better addressed with community feedback rather than one on one.

I get insta-chat banned for verbal abuse every time I swear towards someone which is pretty rare these days because this game has turned to crap. 
Every game, almost literally, their are multiple people intentionally feeding, trolling or some for of negative behaviour to throw games. yet I get chat banned over singular games because I call someone a name just once in a game.
Game are actually unplayable if these people are on your team, and if you verse it, wins feel bloody horrible. 90-95% of my games later are multiple people, in each lobby, that are doing this, yet single game I loose my cool at this crap, I get chat banned and have to wait another 5 months to reach level honor 2. 
Riot support suggested to post my concerns here as they agree my recent match history is ridiculous. And yes they did address the 2 wrongs don't make a right thing, but honestly I can't get my end of season rewards now so I couldn't really care
I supplied evidence from here, ticket got blacklisted right after.
